About Plastic Neutral SHOP OUR PRODUCTS Organic Miso Paste Dried Edible Seaweed Organic Noodles Organic Japanese Teas Oils & Vinegars Condiments & Ingredients EXPLORE OUR RECIPES View all Marvelous Miso Hummus Apr 21, 2024 Originating in the middle east, hummus is made with chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic and spices. We gave this recipe our special touch with the addition of Miso Master organic, naturally fermented miso paste. Latest posts Miso Peanut Thai Sauce Mar 23, 2024 Discover how delicious and easy it is to use miso with this upgraded version of a classic peanut sauce.  Adding miso to savory dips and sauces gives your sauce another layer of yum! The Best Vegan Ponzu Sauce (Japanese Citrus Sauce) Feb 27, 2024 Ponzu sauce is a Japanese sauce frequently used as a dipping sauce or condiment for tempura, sashimi, gyoza or simple cold noodles.  Traditionally, ponzu sauce is made from shoyu or tamari (japanese soy sauces), mirin, rice vinegar, bonita flakes ( katsuobushi Wasabi Nori Seaweed Snack Chips Jan 10, 2024 This delightful little snack recipe is delicious and so easy to make!  We made a basic snack chip using sushi grade nori and real 100% wasabi powder.  These little gems are sure to satisfy those hungry, after school snackers, or a great accompaniment to some hummus and a cup of tea for a much needed afternoon break. Give this low calorie, delicious snack a spin and get two great ingredients into your diet this year. Creamy Wasabi Miso Dressing Dive into the zesty world of wasabi salad dressing and get ready for an explosion of flavor! This perfect combination of spice, flavor, and health will take your salads to the next level.  The subtle heat of wasabi complements the freshness of your salad greens, creating a vibrant taste that will tantalize your taste buds.  Why settle for ordinary when you can elevate your salads with the irresistible combination of spice, flavor, and health? thought: The extracted text does not show any clear signs of unusually low prices or unrealistic money claims. However, there is mention of a seaweed sale and free shipping with a $70 order, which are not necessarily indicators of a scam. The products mentioned are all related to a specific niche (Asian and globally-inspired ingredients), which is not uncommon for a legitimate e-commerce site. Claims such as "Removes 2 lbs of plastic waste from the Himalayan foothills" are part of an eco-conscious commitment which, if true, is a positive aspect. The site also uses Shopify, a legitimate e-commerce platform. I should now check the legitimacy of the company and look for any red flags in the domain information or user reports.

Reviews (2) Sort by: Relevant Newest to Oldest Helpful Rating 4 stars 1 star Timeframe All time Past week Past month Other Verified purchase Contains image or video English only Rachel R. Follow Rachel R. Send Message Share Review “ Great Quality, Fast Shipping ” March 29th, 2024 At first I was a little leary of this site. I couldn't find any reviews and the prices seemed a little too good to be true, especially for the miso paste. I am so glad that I bit the bullet and placed an order! The food arrived packaged carefully and promptly (I am on the other side of the country, it shipped Monday and arrived Friday). The miso paste is undamaged and went straight into the fridge! I am sipping the tea now and am going to enjoy these noodles a little later. 10/10 would recommend. I will absolutely be ordering from here again! Products used: Comment Thank you Respond as company (0) Isabelle C. 4 36 Follow Isabelle C. These guys sell my favorite organic seaweed! May 7th, 2013 These guys sell my favorite organic seaweed! It's super healthy and great for snacks by itself or with a Japanese/sushi inspired meal. AND you can buy it in bulk through their website, which is much cheaper than getting it at Whole Foods or one of those ripoff stores. Impress your friends and get some healthy seaweed! Privacy Policy Cookies Settings Reject All Accept All Cookies Privacy Preference Center When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offers. Allow All Manage Consent Preferences Functional Cookies These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly. Targeting Cookies These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising. Social Media Cookies These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.
